page.name: Try It Yourself: Materials
page.content:
The "Try it Yourself" section includes hands-on activities that you can try with the adult learners in your classroom. Each "Try it Yourself" activity aligns with the topics covered in this course. These activities can be adjusted or edited. Please feel free to use all or parts of them in your classroom in the ways that make sense with your learners.

Click on this hyperlink to the full Try It Yourself section for a list of all activities, or click the next arrow at the bottom of the screen to go to the first activity.
